name: .ARO File Extension
summary: Learn about .ARO files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ARO file is a webpage that includes SteelArrow code. It usually contains mostly HTML with a small portion of SteelArrow tags and scripts. ARO files are processed on the server before being sent to a user's web browser, similar to .PHP or .ASP pages.

content: In order for ARO files to be processed and served correctly, the SteelArrow Web Application Server must be installed on your web server.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
